name: Sunshine Spritz
preparation: Fill a large wine glass with ice cubes. Add the Aperol and Prosecco. Top off with a splash of soda water. Gently stir to combine.
backstory: The Sunshine Spritz was born out of a desire to capture the essence of a sunny day in a glass. Legend has it that an Italian alchemist created this beverage to brighten the spirits of friends during a particularly rainy summer. Its vibrant color and refreshing taste make it a perfect companion for joyous occasions, effortlessly bringing sunshine to any gathering.
food_pairing: Pairs wonderfully with light salads or savory snacks like bruschetta.
